label: % with improved sanitation
description: Percentage of households with access to piped sanitation
description_espanol: Porcentaje de hogares conectados a la red de alcantarillado.

label: % access to drinking water
description: Percentage of households with that are connected to the public water network.
description_espanol: Porcentaje de hogares conectados a la red pública de agua potable

label: % with mobile access
description: Percentage of households with mobile phone access.
description_espanol: Porcentaje de hogares con acceso a telefonía móvil

label: % with internet access
description: Percentage of households with internet access.
description_espanol: Porcentaje de hogares con acceso a internet.

label: Nr. of health facilities per 10,000 people
label_espanol: Nro. de centros de salud por cada 10,000 personas
description: Number of health facilities per 10,000 people.
description_espanol: Número de establecimientos de salud por cada 10,000 personas.

label: % access to power network
label_espanol: % con acceso a la red eléctrica
description: Percentage of households with acces to public power network
description_espanol: Porcentaje de hogares conectados a la red eléctrica

label: Nr. of educational facilities per 10,000 people
label_espanol: Nro. de centros educativos por cada 10,000 personas
description: Number of educational institutes per 10,000 people.
description_espanol: Número de establecimientos educativos por cada 10,000 personas.

label: Road accesibility
description: Accessibility according to road travel time. The original file contains 4 categories: (1) city, (2) 0-15min from commercial/agricultural centre, (3) 15-60min, (4) more than 60min.
description_espanol: Accesibilidad de acuerdo al tiempo de viaje por carretera. El archivo original contiene 4 categorías: (1) ciudad, (2) 0-15 min hacia centros económicos/infraestructuras de acopio y facilidades agrícola, (3) 15-60 min, (4) más de 60 min.

label: # of hit parroquias
description: Number of affected parroquias from events 2008-2017. When 'Total' is selected as event, this means the total number of events times the average number of parroquias that is hit per event. If a parroquia is hit in multiple events, it counts multiple times in this total number.
description_espanol: #N/A

label: Affected crop land
description: Hectares of affected crop land from events 2008-2017
description_espanol: #N/A

label: Population
description: Estimated Population for 2015
description_espanol: Población estimada, calculada por Banco Mundial e INEC, basado en la ECV 2014 y CPV 2010.

label: Volcanic exposure
description: Annual % of population exposed to volcanic activity. Calculated by summing all people affected by volcanic activities over all events in the years 2010-2018, and dividing by the number of years (9) to get the annual amount. Divided by population per parroquia to get the percentage.
description_espanol: % Anual de la población expuesta a eventos de actividad volcánica. Calculado sumando todas las personas afectadas por eventos de actividad volcánica en todos los eventos registrados de inundaciones en los años 2010-2018, y dividiendolo para el número de años (9) para obtener la cantidad anual. Dividido para la población por cada parroquia para obtener el porcentaje.

label: Flood exposure
description: Annual % of population exposed to flood. Calculated by summing all people affected by floods over all flood events in the years 2007-2018, and dividing by the number of years (12) to get the annual amount. Divided by population per parroquia to get the percentage.
description_espanol: % Anual de la población expuesta a inundaciones. Calculado sumando todas las personas afectadas por inundaciones en todos los eventos registrados de inundaciones en los años 2007-2018, y dividiendolo para el número de años (12) para obtener la cantidad anual. Dividido para la población por cada parroquia para obtener el porcentaje.

label: Total length of main rivers
description: Total river length in kilometres
description_espanol: Longitud total de ríos en kilómetros

label: Nr. of RC volunteers per 10,000 people
label_espanol: Nro. de voluntarios de CRE por cada 10,000 personas
description: Number of Red Cross volunteers
description_espanol: Número de voluntarios registrados de la Cruz Roja Ecuatoriana por cada 100,000 personas

label: Nr. of RC volunteers
description: Number of Red Cross volunteers per 100,000 people (see population for source of population data)
description_espanol: Número de voluntarios registrados de la Cruz Roja Ecuatoriana

label: % land use agriculture
description: Percentage of land used for agriculture
description_espanol: Porcentaje de uso de suelo agrícola

label: Average elevation
description: Average elevation
description_espanol: Altitud promedio

label: Waterborne disease incidence per 10,000 people
label_espanol: Incidencia de enfermedades transmitidas por el agua por cada 10,000 personas
description: Percentage of diarrhea, leptospirosis between 2013-2016 per 10,000 people
description_espanol: Porcentaje de casos de enfermedades transmitidas por el agua como diarrea y leptospirosis entre los años 2013-2016 por cada 10,000 personas

label: % strong wall type
description: Percentage of households with strong walls. Strong defined as: concrete, bricks, adobe.
description_espanol: Porcentaje de hogares con tipo de pared fuerte. Paredes fuertes: concreto, bloques, ladrillo y adobe.

label: % of population <5 or 65+
description: Percentage of population belonging to vulnerable age groups. Below 5 years old and older than 65 years old.
description_espanol: Porcentaje de la población perteneciente a grupos de edad vulnerables.Menores a 5 años y mayores a 65 años.

label: Vectorborne disease incidence per 10,000 people
label_espanol: Incidencia de enfermedades transmitidas por vectores por cada 10,000 personas
description: Perrcentage malaria vivax, chikungunya, dengue & leishmaniasis incidences between 2013-2016 per 10,000 people
description_espanol: Porcentaje de casos de enfermedades transmitidas por vectores como la malaria vivax, chikungunya, dengue y leishmaniasis entre los años 2013-2016 por cada 10,000 personas

label: % strong roof type
description: Percentage of households with strong roofs. Strong defined as: concrete, asbestos or roof tiles.
description_espanol: Porcentaje de hogares con un tipo de techo fuerte. Techos fuertes: Concreto, asbesto o teja.

label: Poverty incidence
description: Estimated poverty incidence, calculated by World Bank and INEC, based on ECV 2014 and CPV 2010.
description_espanol: Incidencia de pobreza estimada, calculada por Banco Mundial e INEC, basado en ECV 2014 y CPV 2010.

label: % agricultural labor
description: Percentage of population working in agriculture, animal farming, forestry, fishery
description_espanol: Porcentaje de población dedicada a la agricultura, ganadería, silvicultura y pesca

label: Gini Index
description: Estimated GINI index.
description_espanol: Índice de Gini

label: % persons with disability
description: Percentage of population with permanent disabillity (minimal one year)
description_espanol: Porcentaje de población con discapacidad permanente (mínimo de un año)

label: % analphabetism
description: Percentage of illiterate people
description_espanol: Porcentaje de personas analfabetas

label: # of affected people
description: Number of affected people from events 2008-2017
description_espanol: Número de personas afectadas por eventos desde el año 2008-2017

label: # of damaged houses
description: Number of affected houses from events 2008-2017
description_espanol: Número de casas afectadas por eventos desde el año 2008-2017

label: # of affected people
description: Number of affected people from event 1994-2014.
description_espanol: Número de personas afectadas por eventos desde el año 2008-2017

label: # of damaged houses
description: Number of affected houses from events 1994-2014.
description_espanol: Número de casas afectadas por eventos desde el año 2008-2017

label: Population
description: Alpha version 2010 estimates of numbers of people per grid square, with national totals adjusted to match UN 2015 population division estimates (http://esa.un.org/wpp/).

label: # of IDPs
description: Internally Displaced population. Displacement Reports May/June 2018 from IOM. From URL, click 'Reports' >> 'Displacement Reports'

label: # of IDPs per 10,000 people
description: Internally displaced population divided by total population. Displacement Reports May/June 2018 from IOM. From URL, click 'Reports' >> 'Displacement Reports'.

label: Priority area Water
description: Woreda's are given a priority from 1 (high) to 3 (low) with respect to Water cluster. These numbers are aggregated to zones and regions, which leads to decimal averages.

label: Priority area Health/Nutrition
description: Woreda's are given a priority from 1 (high) to 3 (low) with respect to Health/Nutrition cluster. These numbers are aggregated to zones and regions, which leads to decimal averages.

label: Flood risk
description: Woreda's are defined at flood risk (1) or not (0). These numbers are aggregated to zones and regions, which leads to decimal averages.

label: Population
description: Haitian Institute of Statistics and Information ( IHSI). Estimation methodology here: http://www.ihsi.ht/produit_demo_soc.htm Pcoded version used Administrative boundaries CODs to add pcodes.

label: Multidimensional Poverty Index
description: MPI is the multiplication of Poverty Incidence and Poverty Intensity. See source for more information. Source: OPHI Country Briefing 2017 Haiti.

label: Administrative areas - level 2
description: Administrative boundary data. See link for more information.

label: % Access improved sanitation

label: Administrative areas - level 1
description: Administrative boundary data. See link for more information.
description_french: Zone administrative délimitée. Cliquez sur le lien pour plus d'information.

label: Immunization DTC
description: Immunization rate (or 1-year-olds immunized against): DTC (Average of DTC1 and DTC3). Source: WHO. Based on years 2013-2017. Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel
description_french: Taux d'immunisation des enfants de moins d'1 an contre la DTC (Moyenne des DTC1 et DTC3). Source: WHO. Basé sur la période 2013-2017. Obtenu par INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel

label: # education facilities per 10,000 people
description: The number of fundamental schools divided by population.
description_french: Nombre d'écoles fondamentales divisés par la population.

label: Access to Electricity
description: Access to electricity is the percentage of population with access to electricity. Electrification data are collected from industry, national surveys and international sources. Based on years 2013-2017. Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel
description_french: Pourcentage de la population ayant accès à l'électricité. Les données sur l'électrification proviennent de l'industrie, des enquêtes nationales, et des sources internationales. Basé sur la période 2013-2017. Obtenu par INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel

label: # health facilities per 10,000 people
description: The number of Health sites divided by the population.
label_french: Nbre d'établissements de santé par 10.000 personnes
description_french: Nombre d'établissements de santé divisés par la population.

label: Access to Improved Water Source
description: The indicator defines the percentage of population with reasonable access (within one km) to an adequate amount of water (20 litres per person) through a household connection, public standpipe well or spring, or rain water system. An improved drinking-water source is defined as one that, by nature of its construction or through active intervention, is protected from outside contamination, in particular from contamination with faecal matter. Based on years 2012-2017. Source: WHO Global Health Observatory Data Repository. Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel
label_french: Accès à un point d'eau amélioré
description_french: La proportion de la population ayant accès (à moins d'un km) à un volume d'eau (20 litres par personne) via un branchement domestique, borne fontaine publique, forages, puits protégés, sources protégées, collecteurs d’eau de pluie. Une source d'eau améliorée doit être protégée de la contamination extérieure, comme celle des matières fécales. Basé sur la période 2012-2017. Obtenu par INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel

label: Adult Literacy
description: Total is the percentage of the population age 15 and above who can, with understanding, read and write a short, simple statement on their everyday life. Based on years 2013-2016. Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel
description_french: Pourcentage de personnes âgées de 15 ans ou plus, qui sont capable de lire, comprendre et écrire un texte court sur leur vie quotidienne. Basé sur la période 2013-2016. Obtenu par INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel

label: Immunization Measles
description: The percentage of children under one year of age who have received at least one dose of measles-containing vaccine in a given year. The physical infrastructure component tries to assess the accessibility as well as the redundancy of the systems which are two crucial characteristics in a crisis situation. Measles immunization coverage is a good proxy of health system performance. Based on years 2013-2017. Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel
description_french: La proportion d'enfants de moins d'1 an, ayant reçu au moins une dose de vaccination contre la rougeole pendant l'année indiquée. Ce composant sert à évaluer l'accessibilité aux systèmes de santé, important pendant une situation de crise. L'immunisation contre la rougeole est un bon indicateur de la performance du système de santé. Basé sur la période 2013-2017. Obtenu par INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel

label: Access to Sanitation
description: Access to improved sanitation facilities refers to the percentage of the population using improved sanitation facilities. The improved sanitation facilities include flush/pour flush (to piped sewer system, septic tank, pit latrine), ventilated improved pit (VIP) latrine, pit latrine with slab, and composting toilet. Based on years 2012-2017. Source: World Bank. Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel
description_french: Pourcentage de la population utilisant des installations sanitaires améliorées, incluant: latrine à chasse d'eau (liée à un système de canalisation d'égouts, une fosse septique), latrine VIP, une fosse de latrine avec bloc, ou une toilette compostée. Basé sur la période 2012-2017. Obtenu par INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel

label: Population
description: Population per commune from 2017. Source: DNCT - Direction Nationale des Collectivités Territorielles, DNP - Direction Nationale de la Population.
description_french: Population par commune en 2017. Source: DNCT - Direction Nationale des Collectivités Territorielles, DNP - Direction Nationale de la Population.

label: Conflict fatalities
description: Nr. of fatalities during armed conflicts between aug-2017 and july-2018. Source: ACLED (Armed Conflict Location & Event Data Project) Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel
description_french: Nombre de décès pendant les conflits armés survenus entre août 2017 et juillet 2018. Source: ACLED (Armed Conflict Location & Event Data Project). Obtenu par INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel

label: Drought exposure
description: Global grid dataset which estimates the expected number of people exposed to drought annually. Divided by the population data, to get the relative exposure instead of the absolute number of people affected.
description_espanol: Conjunto de datos grillados que estima el número esperado de personas expuestas a las sequía anualmente. Dividido por los datos de población, para obtener la exposición relativa en lugar de la cantidad absoluta de personas afectadas - UNISDR
description_french: Jeu de données global utilisé pour estimer le nombre annuel de personnes exposées aux sécheresses. Normalisé par la population, cet indice représente l'exposition relative plutôt que le nombre absolu de personnes affectées.

label: Food Insecurity
description: The indicator is based on the Cadre Harmonisé from 2012 to 2016. For each year, the highest phase values has been used for each admin1 unit. The yearly IPC level values are normalized between 0-10 and then the indicator is the mean of the 5 years scores. Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018.
description_french: Cet indicateur est basé sur le Cadre Harmonisé entre 2012 et 2016. Pour chaque année les valeurs les plus hautes ont été utilisées. Les niveaux d'IPC annuels ont été normalisés entre 0-10, et l'indicateur révèle les scores moyens sur 5 années. Obtenu par INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel

label: Land Degradation
description: Land degradation has been defined by LADA as the reduction in the capacity of the land to provide ecosystem goods and services over a period of time for its beneficiaries. Ecosystem goods refer to absolute quantities of land produce having an economic or social value for human beings. The land degradation classes‘ map describes the overall status in provision of biophysical ecosystem services and the processes of declining biophysical ecosystem services. Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel
description_french: LADA définit la dégradation des sols comme une réduction des terres à produire des biens et services écosystémiques, référant à la capacité des terres à produire une valeur économique et sociale pour les humains. Les classes de dégradation des sols décrivent le statut biophysique des services ecosystémiques. Obtenu par INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel

label: Food Insecurity Percentage
description: The indicator is based on the last Cadre Harmonisé available. It assesses the current risk of food insecurity. The indicator is the total severe food Insecure people (IPC 3+). Based on years 2012-2018. Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel
description_french: Cet indicateur est basé sur le Cadre Harmonisé et montre le nombre total de personnes affectées par l'insécurité alimentaire (IPC 3+). Basé sur la période 2012-2018. Obtenu par INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel

label: Acute Malnutrition U5
description: Prevalence of global acute malnutrition in children 0-59 months in years 2016-2018. Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel
description_french: Prévalence de la malnutrition aigüe sévère chez les enfants de 0-59 mois. Basé sur la période 2016-2018. Obtenu par INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel

label: HIV Prevalence
description: The estimated number of adults aged 15-49 years with HIV infection, whether or not they have developed symptoms of AIDS, expressed as per cent of total population in that age group. Based on years 2013-2017. Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel
description_french: Proportion estimée des adultes âgés entre 15 et 49 ans infectés au VIH, avec ou sans symptômes de SIDA. Basé sur la période 2013-2017. Obtenu par INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel

label: Income inequality
description: Gini index measures the extent to which the distribution of income or consumption expenditure among individuals or households within an economy deviates from a perfectly equal distribution. Thus a Gini index of 0 represents perfect equality, while an index of 100 implies perfect inequality. Based on years 2014-2017. Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel
description_french: Indice Gini est une mesure statistique permettant de rendre compte de la répartition d'un indice (salaire, revenus, patrimoine) au sein d'une population. Elle mesure le niveau d'inégalité dans la population. Le coefficient de 0 représente une parfaite égalité et un coefficient de 100 représente une inégalité totale. Basé sur la période 2014-2017. Obtenu par INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel

label: Measles Prevalence
description: MEACLIM - clinically confirmed measles case. Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel
description_french: MEACLIM - Les cas cliniquement confirmés de rougeole. Obtenu par INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel

label: Mortality rate U5
description: This indicator shows the probability of death between birth and the end of the fifth year per 1000 live births. Based on years 2013-2017. Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel
description_french: L'indicateur montre la probabilité de mourir entre la naissance et la fin de la 5ème année de la vie d'un enfant, sur 1000 naissances vivantes. Basé sur la période 2013-2017. Obtenu par INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel

label: Poverty Index
description: The Multidimensional Poverty MPI Index identifies overlapping deprivations at the household level across the same three dimensions as the Human Development Index (living standards, health, and education) and shows the average number of poor people and deprivations with which poor households contend. Based on years 2010-2016. Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel
description_french: L'Indice de Pauvreté Multi-dimensionel (MPI) identifie les privations qui se chevauchent à travers les 3 dimensions de l'Indice de Développement Humain: niveau de vie, santé et éducation. La MPI calcule the nombre moyen de personnes pauvres et les privations auxquelles les ménages pauvres sont confrontés. Basé sur la période 2010-2016. Obtenu par INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel

label: Underweight U5
description: This indicator shows the ratio between weight and age of children under five. Based on years 2016-2018. Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel
description_french: L'indicateur montre le ratio entre le poids et l'âge des enfants de moins de 5 ans. Basé sur la période 2016-2018. Obtenu par INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel

label: Underweight Women
description: Prevalence of low body mass index (BMI) in Women. Based on years 2016-2017. Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel
description_french: Prévalence d'un indice de masse corporelle (IMC) faible chez les femmes. Basé sur la période 2016-2017. Obtenu par INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel

label: Uprooted people (rel)
description: “Persons of concern” includes refugees, asylum-seekers, returnees, stateless persons and groups of internally displaced persons (IDPs). Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel
description_french: Les personnes déracinées sont les réfugiés, demandeurs d'asile, rapatriés, apatrides et les groupes des personnes déplacées internes. Obtenu par INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel

label: Administrative areas - level 3
description: Administrative boundary data. See link for more information.

label: Administrative areas - level 2
description: Administrative boundary data. See link for more information.

label: Health facilities per 10,000 people
description: Every admin area contains multiple categories. The current value is the average, taken into account the area per category.

label: GDP per capita
description: Global grid dataset which estimates the spatial distribution of GDP. Divided by the population data, to get GDP per capita.

label: Administrative areas - level 4
description: Administrative boundary data. See link for more information.

label: Administrative areas - level 3
description: Administrative boundary data. See link for more information.

label: Administrative areas - level 2
description: Administrative boundary data. See link for more information.

label: % with piped water
description: National Statistics Office of Malawi. Percentage of households with piped water into house or communal, vs. water from open/protected wells or rivers/ponds/etc.

label: % with mobile access
description: National Statistics Office of Malawi. Percentage of households with access to mobile phone. Data is relatively old, but relative differences between districts are still meaningful indicators of infrastructural coping capacity.

label: % with improved sanitation
description: National Statistics Office of Malawi. Percentage of households with access to improved sanitation.

label: Nr. of facilities per 10,000 people
description: Data from MASDAP on point locations of health facilities in Malawi, and divides by population to get the # of facilities for each 10,000 people.
source_organization: Department of Health: Field Health Service Information System (FHSIS)

label: Connected to power network
description: Nighttime satelite imagery (see link) was used to determine availability of electricity per Traditional Authority (admin-3). Three cases were distinguished per TA: Yes (1), Limited (0.5) and No (0).

label: Population
description: Census data from 2008 per TA, scaled to match district-level population of 2014 from http://www.geohive.com/cntry/malawi.aspx.

label: Flood risk (0-10)
description: Measure of flood risk. See link for more information on methodology.

label: Drought risk (0-10)
description: The drought risk map was created by analyzing rainfall data in the past 20 years using standard precipitation index (SPI) , which is a widely used index in drought analysis. Based on SPI6 values for the period October-march, which is the main rainy season in Malawi. Each pixel is classified to drought or no drought for each year based on SPI6 values, drought year if SPI value for a pixel is less than -1. Next, relative frequency is calculated, the number of times drought has occurred in the considered 20 year period. This frequency is then converted to probability of drought occurrence in a given year. We validated our analysis by comparing NDVI values for the drought year against long term average values.

label: RC volunteers per 100,000 people
description: Per Red Cross branche the # of volunteers was requested (this measure is probably not perfect, but as good as possible). Where needed, this was aggregated to districts (some districts have 2 branches, most have 1). The # of volunteers is divided by the district population to get to this capacity.

label: Active NGOs per 100,000 people
description: Based on 3W Operational Presence per district from OCHA (Jan 2016). The # of active Leading Organisations per district is used, as it is deemed the best and most structural proxy of NGO presence/capacity per district.

label: Identified for ECHO2
description: An application of this dashboard is to do INFORM-risk-based prioritization for the ECHO2-project in Malawi. Three TA's within three districts are pre-identified for area-selection. You can see here which areas those are.

label: Poverty incidence
description: Worldpop: estimates of proportion of people living in poverty as defined by $1.25 per day.

label: Life expectancy
description: National Statistics Office of Malawi. Life expectancy at birth.

label: Infant mortality rate
description: National Statistics Office of Malawi. Infant mortality rate (<1 year) per 1,000 born infants.

label: Food Consumption Score
description: Percentage of people that has a Food Consumption Score of 'acceptable' level, versus 'poor' or 'borderline'.

label: % with (semi)permanent house materials
description: National Statistics Office of Malawi. Percentage of households with (semi)permanent construction materials vs. traditional materials.

label: Administrative areas - level 4
description: Administrative boundary data. See link for more information.

label: Administrative areas - level 3
description: Administrative boundary data. See link for more information.

label: Administrative areas - level 2
description: Administrative boundary data. See link for more information.

label: Provisioning %
description: Deprivation in economic provisioning

label: No safe water %
description: % withouth safe water

label: Malnourished %
description: % of malnourished children under 5

label: Illiteracy %
description: Adult illiteracy rate

label: Human Poverty Index
description: Human Poverty Index

label: Human Development Index
description: Human Development Index

label: Early death %
description: % of population not expected to survive age 40

label: Administrative areas - level 3
description: Administrative boundary data. See link for more information.
description_espanol: Datos de límites administrativos. Ver enlace para más información.

label: Administrative areas - level 2
description: Administrative boundary data. See link for more information.
description_espanol: Datos de límites administrativos. Ver enlace para más información.

label: Administrative areas - level 1
description: Administrative boundary data. See link for more information.
description_espanol: Datos de límites administrativos. Ver enlace para más información.

label: % with improved sanitation
description: Percentage of households with access to improved sanitation.
description_espanol: Porcentaje de viviendas con acceso a sanemiento mejorado - INEI

label: % with piped water
label_espanol: % de abastecimiento de H20 en las viviendas
description: Percentage of households with piped water into house or communal, vs. water from open/protected wells or rivers/ponds/etc.
description_espanol: Porcentaje de viviendas con agua entubada dentro del domicilio o frente a agua de pozos abiertos, protegidos, ríos, estanques, etc - INEI

label: % with mobile access
label_espanol: % de hogares con aceso a telefonía movil
description: % of households with mobile access. Based on ENAHO survey.
description_espanol: Porcentaje de hogares con acceso a telefonía movil. Basados en la encuenta de ENAHO

label: % with internet access
label_espanol: % de hogares con acceso a internet
description: % of households with internet access. Based on ENAHO survey.
description_espanol: Porcentaje de hogares con acceso a conexión a internet. Basado en la encuesta ENAHO - INEI

label: Nr. of health facilities per 10,000 people
label_espanol: Número de centros de salud por cada 10K personas
description: Number of health clinics per 10,000 people. Source: Base de datos a diciembre 2016 - Superintendencia Nacional de Salud del Ministerio de Salud
description_espanol: Número de centros de salud por cada 10K personas - MINSA

label: Nr. of educational facilities per 10,000 people
label_espanol: Número de centros educativos por cada 10K personas
description: Number of educational institutes per 10,000 people. Source: Base de datos al 2016 del ESCALE - Ministerio de Educación
description_espanol: Número de centros educativos por cada 10K personas - MINEDU

label: # of hit distritos
description: Number of affected distritos from events 2008-2017. When 'Total' is selected as event, this means the total number of events times the average number of distritos that is hit per event. If a distrito is hit in multiple events, it counts multiple times in this total number.
description_espanol: Número de distritos afectados por los eventos del año 2008-2017. Cuando se selecciona "Total" como evento, esto significa el número total de eventos multiplicado por el número promedio de distritos que han sido impactados por evento. Si un distrito es impactado en múltiples eventos, cuenta varias veces en este número total.

label: Population
description_espanol: Población proyectada para el año 2016 - INEI

label: Exposure to frost
description: Annual average number of affected people by snow fall between 2003-2017 divided by population to get the amount for each 10,000 people
description_espanol: Promedio anual del número de personas afectadas por la caída de nieve en los años 2003-2017 por cada 10K personas - INDECI

label: Exposure to cold waves
description: Annual average number of affected people by cold waves between 2003-2017 divided by population to get the amount for each 10,000 people
description_espanol: Promedio anual del número de personas afectadas por la presencia de heladas en los años 2003-2017 por cada 10K personas - INDECI

label: Average elevation
description: Average elevation
description_espanol: Altitud o elevación promedio - JAXA (Agencia Aeroespacial de Japón)

label: No. of alpacas
description: Number of alpacas per area.
description_espanol: Número de alpacas por área - CENEPRED, fuente original: MINAGRI

label: Waterborne disease incidence per 10,000 people
label_espanol: Enfermedades transmitidas por el H20 por cada 10K personas
description: Percentage diarrhea & leptospirose incidences in 2017 per 10,000 people
description_espanol: Porcentaje de efermedades como la malaria vivax, dengue y leishmaniasis en 2017 por cada 10K personas - CENEPRED

label: % strong wall type
description: % of households with strong walls. Strong defined as: Brick, cement, stone or adobe walls. Based on ENAHO survey.
description_espanol: Porcentaje de hogares con paredes fuertes. Fuerte definido como: paredes de ladrillo, cemento, piedra o adobe. Basado en la encuesta ENAHO - INEI

label: Vectorborne disease incidence per 10,000 people
label_espanol: Enfermedades transmitidas por vectores por cada 10K personas
description: Percentage malaria vivax, dengue & leishmaniasis incidences in 2017 per 10,000 people
description_espanol: Porcentaje de casos de malaria vivax, chikungunya, dengue y leishmaniasis entre 2013-2016 por cada 10K personas - MINSA

label: % strong roof type
description: % of households with strong roofs. Strong defined as: reinforced concrete, tiles or roof panels. Based on ENAHO survey.
description_espanol: Porcentaje de hogares con techos fuertes. Fuerte definido como: hormigón armado, azulejos o paneles de techo. Basado en la encuesta ENAHO - INEI

label: Poverty incidence
description: Estimation of percentage of population living below the poverty line
description_espanol: Estimación del porcentaje de población que vive por debajo del umbral de pobreza - INEI

label: % malnutrition U5 children
label_espanol: Desnutrución crónica en niños < a 5 años
description: Percentage chronical malnutrition children U5 - MINSA
description_espanol: Porcentaje de desnutrición crónica en niños < a 5 años - MINSA

label: % analphabetism
description: INEI 2013
description_espanol: Porcentaje de población con analfabetismo - INEI

label: Life expectancy
description: Life expectancy at birth, original source: INEI. Censo de Población y Vivienda 2007. ENAHO y ENAPRES. Recalculated by UNDP.
description_espanol: Porcentaje de población con esperanza de vida al nacer, fuente original: INEI. Censo de Población y Vivienda 2007. ENAHO y ENAPRES. Proyección para 2012 del PNUD.

label: Infant mortality rate
description: Infant mortality rate for children under-5 (per 1,000 live births) from INEI
description_espanol: Tasa de mortalidad infantil en niños < de 5 años por cada 10K personas - INEI

label: Administrative areas - level 4
description: Administrative boundary data. This dataset is only shared within the closed HDX group of OCHA Philippines.

label: Administrative areas - level 3
description: Administrative boundary data. See link for more information.

label: Administrative areas - level 2
description: Administrative boundary data. See link for more information.

label: Completely damaged (rel.)
description: Number of completely damaged houses, made relative to the total number of houses in the municpality.

label: Total damaged houses (rel.)
description: Number of damaged houses, made relative to the total number of houses in the municpality.

label: Predicted # of houses damaged
description: Prediction of number of households damaged (partially + completely together).

label: Distance to typhoon
description: Closest distance to the typhoon path in kilometers.

label: # schools per 10,000 people
description: Number of primary and secondary schools, made relative to population. Source: Department of Education. Accessed through OCHA Pre-disaster indicators on HDX.

label: # evacuation centers per 10,000 people
description: Number of evacuation centers per 10,000 people. Source: DILG. Accessed through OCHA Pre-disaster indicators on HDX.

label: Human development Index
description: Government data with estimation of Human Development Index on a provincial level.
source_organization: Philippines Statistics Authority / Human Development Network

label: # health facilities per 10,000 people
description: Data from FHSIS report, which sums Barangay Health Stations, Rural Health Units, Government Hospitals and Private Hospitals, and divides by population to get the # of facilities for each 10,000 people. Data collected through OCHA pre-disaster indicators. (Direct source to be added).
source_organization: Department of Health: Field Health Service Information System (FHSIS)

label: % of land irrigated
description: Proportion of agricultural land serviced by government irrigation facilities. Source: Provincial Irrigation Development masterplan (2017-2026)

label: Elevation
description: Mean elevation in meters per municipality.

label: Ruggedness
description: Mean ruggedness in the municipality. Ruggedness is the variability of slope. So an evenly climbing mountain has low ruggedness, but a very unevenly climbing mountain has high ruggedness.

label: Pantawid (4P) beneficiaries
description: # of beneficiaries of Pantawid (4P) poverty program, made relative to population. Source: Pantawid July 2016 Report via OCHA Pre-disaster indicators. (Here linked to indirect source UN OCHA, direct source to be included.)
source_organization: Department of Social Welfare and Development

label: Partly damaged (rel.)
description: Number of partially damaged houses, made relative to the total number of houses in the municpality.

label: % strong roof type
description: Percentage of buildings with (partly) concrete or iron or aluminium roofs. Source: OCHA Pre-disaster indicators. (Direct government source to be included).
source_organization: Philippines Statistics Authority: Population and Housing Census

label: % strong wall type
description: Percentage of buildings with (partly) concrete or brick walls. Source: PSA/OCHA.
source_organization: Philippines Statistics Authority: Population and Housing Census

label: Population
description: Population data from the most recent census in the Philippines (2015), collected on barangay-level.

label: % population <5
description: Percentage of population with age 5 or lower. Source: Census 2015.

label: Poverty incidence
description: Estimation of percentage of population living below the poverty line, per municipality.

label: Predicted damage class (1-5)
description: Predicted damage class (1-5: where 5 is highest damage). See link for full methodology.

label: % of HH occupying lot rent-free
description: % of households occupying the lot they live on rent-free. This is meant as a proxy of informal settlements, which represents an important vulnerable group. Source: PSA Census 2015.

label: % skilled Agriculture/Forestry/Fishermen
description: Skilled Agriculture, Forestry and Fisher workers as percentage of population. Source: PSA Census 2015

label: % water-sealed toilet
description: Households with water-sealed toilet facility, as percentage of total. Source: PSA Census 2010. Accessed through OCHA Pre-disaster indicators on HDX.

label: Predicted % of houses damaged
description: Prediction of percentage of households damaged (partially + completely together).

label: % vulnerable population
description: Vulnerable population as percentage of total. Vulnerable groups include: Child-head of HH, Single-head of HH, Disabled persons, Solo Parents, Older persons. Source: DSWD National Household Targeting Office. Accessed through OCHA Pre-disaster indicators on HDX.

label: % safe water source
description: Households with own/shared use of faucet community water system or tubed/piped deep well, as percentage of total. Source: PSA Census 2015. Accessed through OCHA Pre-disaster indicators on HDX.

label: Wind speed
description: Maximum wind speed reached per municipality.

label: Cyclone exposure
description: Global grid dataset which estimates the expected number of people exposed to cyclones annually. The sum is taken of two sources: impact by wind and impact by storm surge. Divided by the population data, to get the relative exposure instead of the absolute number of people affected.

label: DPI
description: The Data Preparedness Index (DPI) is a measure of how well the INFORM-framework is filled for the selected country and administrative level, and thereby it is a measure of the overall Data Preparedness of the country. The DPI is derived by multiplying scores on Completeness, Recency and Quality. (See each of these for a more detailed description.) Note that a score of 0.125 results when all subcomponents score 0.5 / 50%.
description_espanol: El Índice de preparación de datos (DPI) es una medida qué tan bien se llena el marco INFORM para el país y el nivel administrativo seleccionados, y por lo tanto es una medida de la preparación de datos general del país. El DPI se obtiene al multiplicar puntajes en integridad, actualización y calidad. (Consulte cada uno de estos para obtener una descripción más detallada.) Tenga en cuenta que se obtiene una puntuación de 0.125 cuando todos los subcomponentes obtienen una puntuación de 0.5 / 50%
description_french: Le statut des données disponibles représente le degré de remplissage du cadre INFORM aux données de ce pays et au niveau administratif choisi. Il mesure le statut des données générales du pays et il est calculé en multipliant les scores de l'exhaustivité, du degré d'actualité et de la qualité. Veuillez noter que si chaque composant est de 0.5 ou 50%, le résultat sera 0.5x0.5x0.5 = 0.125.

label: Quality
description: The quality score gives a measure of the quality of a source (irrespective of its recency). E.g. a census is of higher quality then a survey, etc.
description_espanol: El puntaje de calidad da una medida de la calidad de una fuente (independientemente de su antigüedad). P.ej. un censo es de mayor calidad que una encuesta, etc.
description_french: Cet indicateur mesure la qualité d'une référence, quel que soit le degré d'actualité. Par exemple, un recensement est de meilleur qualité qu'une enquête.

label: Recency
description: The recency score measures how relevant the source stilll is, given its publishing year and its "retention period".
description_espanol: El puntaje de actualización mide cuán relevante es la fuente del archivo, dado su año de publicación y su "período de retención".
description_french: Cet indicateur mesure le degré d'actualité d'une référence, basé sur l'année de la publication et la période de conservation.

label: Completeness
description: The completeness indicator counts for how many indicators of the INFORM framework at least one source is included for the selected country and administrative level. Having more than one source for one indicator does not increase the Completeness score.
description_espanol: El indicador de integridad contabiliza la cantidad de indicadores del sistema INFORM y al menos una fuente está incluida en el país seleccionado y nivel administrativo. Teniendo más de una fuente para los indicadores no incrementarán el puntaje de integridad.
description_french: Cet indicateur compte le nombre d'indicateurs pour lesquels au moins une source a été inclue dans le cadre INFORM, pour le pays et le niveau administratif sélectionnés.

label: Land area
description: Area computed on the basis of the administrative boundary data.
description_espanol: Área calculada sobre la base de la división administrativa de nivel distrital.
description_french: Superficie territoriale calculée à partir des données de la zone administrative délimitée.

label: Population density
description: Most recent population data (see population info), divided by land area (computed from boundary data) in square kilometers.
description_espanol: Datos de población más recientes (ver información de población), divididos por el total de área (calculada a partir de datos de límites) en kilómetros cuadrados.
description_french: Données les plus récentes (voir informations sur la population), divisées par superficie territoriale, en kilomètres carrés.

label: Flood exposure
description: Global grid dataset which estimates the expected number of people exposed to floods annually. Divided by the population data, to get the relative exposure instead of the absolute number of people affected.
description_espanol: Conjunto de datos grillados que estima el número esperado de personas expuestas a las inundaciones anualmente. Dividido por los datos de población, para obtener la exposición relativa en lugar de la cantidad absoluta de personas afectadas - UNISDR
description_french: Jeu de données global utilisé pour estimer le nombre annuel de personnes exposées aux inondations. Normalisé par la population, cet indice représente l'exposition relative plutôt que le nombre absolu des personnes affectées.

label: Lack of Coping Capacity
year: Index of various indicators: see underlying indicators for source year.
description: The Coping Capacity component of the Risk Score contains information on institutional and infrastructural capacity to coping with disasters. You can inspect which indicators are included at present, by expanding the Coping Capacity-section in the sidebar on the left.
description_espanol: La capacidad de respuesta es un componente del puntaje del riesgo que contiene información sobre la capacidad institucional y de la infraestructura para hacer frente a los desastres. Usted puede inspeccionar que indicadores están incluidos en este momento, expandiendo la sección "Capacidad de afrontamiento" en la barra lateral de la izquierda.
description_french: L'indicateur de capacité d'adaptation contient les informations sur la capacité des institutions et de l'infrastructure de s'adapter en cas de désastre. Les indicateurs qui font partie de la capacité d'adaptation sont visibles en élargissant la colonne de gauche.

label: Hazards exposure
year: Index of various indicators: see underlying indicators for source year.
description: The hazards exposure pillar contains information on the relative risk of various types of hazards happening. You can inspect which indicators are included at present, by expanding the Hazards-section in the sidebar on the left.
description_espanol: El sustento de la exposición a los peligros contiene información sobre el riesgo relativo de varios tipos de amanezas. Usted puede inspeccionar la sección de Peligros en la barra lateral de la izquierda.
description_french: L'exposition aux aléas contient les informations sur les risques relatifs à la survenue de différents aléas. Les indicateurs qui font partie de l'exposition aux aléas sont visibles en élargissant la colonne de gauche.

label: Risk score
year: Index of various indicators: see underlying indicators for source year.
description: This risk score is a 1-10 score which combines all underlying indicators into one index, comparable across communities. It is made up of three main pillars: vulnerability, hazards exposure and lack of coping capacity. The method and conceptual framework are derived from the INFORM model (www.inform-index.org), which applies it on a national level instead of a sub-national / community level.
description_espanol: Este puntaje de riesgo es un puntaje de 1-10 que combina todos los indicadores subyacentes en un índice, comparable entre comunidades. Está compuesto por tres pilares principales: vulnerabilidad, exposición a los peligros y falta de capacidad de afrontamiento o respuesta. El método y el marco conceptual se derivan del modelo INFORM (www.inform- index.org), que lo aplica a nivel nacional en lugar de a nivel subnacional / comunitario.
description_french: L'indice de risque est un indice entre 1 et 10 combinant plusieurs indicateurs comparés à travers des communautés. Il comporte trois composants majeurs: la vulnérabilité, l'exposition aux aléas et le manque de capacité d'adaptation. La méthode et le cadre conceptuel sont basés sur le modèle INFORM (www.inform-index.org), qui s'applique au niveau national plutôt qu'au niveau communautaire.

label: Vulnerability
year: Index of various indicators: see underlying indicators for source year.
description: The vulnerability pillar contains information on vulnerability: relative socio-economic status, but also inequality and presence of specific vulnerable groups. You can inspect which indicators are included at present, by expanding the Vulnerability-section in the sidebar on the left.
description_espanol: El sustento de la vulnerabilidad contiene información sobre el estado socioeconómico relativo, pero también desigualdad y presencia de grupos vulnerables específicos. Puede inspeccionar qué indicadores están incluidos actualmente, expandiendo la sección de vulnerabilidad en la barra lateral a la izquierda.
description_french: L' indice de vulnérabilité contient de les informations sur la situation socioéconomique, l'inégalité et la présence de groupes vulnérables. Les indicateurs qui font partie de la vulnérabilité sont visibles en élargissant la colonne de gauche.

label: Earthquake exposure
description: Global grid dataset which estimates the expected number of people exposed to earthquakes annually. In this case a magnitude of 7 is taken for earthquakes to be included. Divided by the population data, to get the relative exposure instead of the absolute number of people affected.
description_espanol: Conjunto de datos grillados que estima el número esperado de personas expuestas a un terremoto anualmente. En este caso, se toma una magnitud de 7° para que se incluyan los terremotos. Dividido por los datos de población, para obtener la exposición relativa en lugar de la cantidad absoluta de personas afectadas - UNISDR

label: Completely damaged (abs.)
description: Completely damaged houses per municipality.

label: Total damaged houses (abs.)
description: Total number of damaged houses (completely + partially).

label: Total # of houses
description: Total # of houses in the municipality, which is used to make the relative versions of the damage variables. The number of houses is calculated by using the 2015-census population data and dividing by 4 to account for household size. This is deemed a better proxy than the number of households which was available from the 2010 census.

label: Slope
description: Mean slope in the municipality. Slope is the change of elevation, so it is higher in mountaineous areas.

label: Mercalli intensity
description: Mercalli Intensity is a measure of seismic intensity of the earthquake. Source: USGS Shakemap.

label: Partly damaged (abs.)
description: Partly damaged houses per municipality.

label: Travel time to nearest city
description: Global grid dataset which estimates the travel time in minutes to the nearest city of at least 50k inhabitants. Even though the source is from 2000, this source is still a strong indicator of the remoteness of a community, and thus the relative availability or absence of facilities needed for coping capacity.

label: Drought exposure
description: Global grid dataset which estimates the expected number of people exposed to drought annually. Divided by the population data, to get the relative exposure instead of the absolute number of people affected.
description_espanol: Conjunto de datos grillados que estima el número esperado de personas expuestas a las sequía anualmente. Dividido por los datos de población, para obtener la exposición relativa en lugar de la cantidad absoluta de personas afectadas - UNISDR

label: Tsunami exposure
description: Global grid dataset which estimates the expected number of people exposed to a tsunami annually. Divided by the population data, to get the relative exposure instead of the absolute number of people affected.
description_espanol: Conjunto de datos grillados que estima el número esperado de personas expuestas ante un tsunami anualmente. Dividido por los datos de población, para obtener la exposición relativa en lugar de la cantidad absoluta de personas afectadas - UNISDR

label: Administrative areas - level 3
description: Administrative boundary data. See link for more information.

label: Administrative areas - level 2
description: Administrative boundary data. See link for more information.

label: Administrative areas - level 1
description: Administrative boundary data. See link for more information.

label: % Access improved sanitation
description: Percentage of population with access to improved sanitation. Improvedsanitation includes improved toilet facilities that include flush toilet, VIP Latrine, covered pit latrine private with a slab and Ecosan

label: % with mobile access
description: Percentage of households with mobile phone access.

label: % with internet access
description: Percentage of households with internet access.

label: Nr. of health facilities per 10,000 people
description: Number of health clinics per 10,000 people.

label: % Access to electricity
description: Percentage of population who use electricity for lightning in their house.

label: Nr. of educational facilities per 10,000 people
description: Number of educational institutes per 10,000 people.

label: % Access to safe drinking water
description: Percentage of population with access to improved water sources, which include piped water and water drawn from protected springs as well as from deep boreholes.

label: Population
description: Alpha version 2015 estimates of population, with national totals adjusted to match UN population division estimates (http://esa.un.org/wpp/) and remaining unadjusted.

label: # of displaced / local population
description: Number of displaced persons. Original data last updated 29 Aug 2018.

label: # of displaced persons
description: Number of displaced persons. Original data last updated 29 Aug 2018.

label: Average elevation
description: Average elevation

label: % permanent wall type
description: Percentage of households with permanent wall materials

label: % Subsistence farming
description: Percentage of population who obtained their livelihood from subsistence farming.

label: % permanent roof type
description: Percentage of households with permanent roof materials

label: Poverty incidence
description: Alpha version 2011 estimates of proportion of people per grid square living in poverty, as defined by $2 a day thresholds. Tatem AJ, Gething PW, Bhatt S, Weiss D and Pezzulo C (2013) Pilot high resolution poverty maps, University of Southampton/Oxford.

label: % of orphans under 18
description: Percentage of children under 18 that are orphans

label: % having mosquito nets
description: Percentage of population that has a mosquito net

label: % Literacy
description: Percentage of adult population that is illiterate

label: % employed
description: Percentage of the population older than 15 that is employed.

label: % persons with disability
description: Percentage of population that is older than 2 with a disability.

label: Violent incidents last year
description: ACLED data on conflict & violent incidents.

label: Population
description: Population included in admin-boundary from 2014. See link for more info.

label: Administrative areas - level 3
description: Administrative boundary data. See link for more information.

label: Administrative areas - level 2
description: Administrative boundary data. See link for more information.

label: Administrative areas - level 1
description: Administrative boundary data. See link for more information.

label: Improved sanitation
description: households with improved sanitation

label: Physical asset ownership
description: Average of 3 physical asset ownership variables (0-1): plough, oxen and motor vehicle.

label: Electronic asset ownership
description: Average of 3 electronic asset ownership variables (0-1): acces to computer, TV and radio.

label: Access to mobile phone
description: Access to Mobile Phone

label: Population
description: Population estimates from WORLDPOP, with national totals adjusted to match UN population division estimates (http://esa.un.org/wpp/)

label: % area settled
description: To add

label: % area rice
description: To add

label: % area maize
description: To add

label: # poultry per km2
description: To add

label: # pigs per km2
description: To add

label: # cattle per km2
description: To add

label: Poverty incidence
description: Estimated Poverty incidence per ward. Data available in TXT-attachment in link.

label: U5 mortality rate
description: U5 mortality rate: number of deaths before 5 per 1,000 live births

label: U5 malnutrition
description: malnutrition under 5 years

label: Female head of HH
description: female head of household

label: % engaged in agriculture
description: households engaged in agriculture

label: Travel time to nearest city
label_espanol: Tiempo de viaje a la ciudad más cercana
description: Global grid dataset which estimates the travel time in minutes to the nearest city of at least 50k inhabitants. Even though the source is from 2000, this source is still a strong indicator of the remoteness of a community, and thus the relative availability or absence of facilities needed for coping capacity.
description_espanol: Tiempo de viaje estimado a la ciudad más cercana de 50K o más personas en el año 2000 - Unión Europea
label_french: Temps de voyage à la ville la plus proche
description_french: Jeu de données basé sur une trame mondiale utilisée pour estimer le temps de voyage (mesuré en minutes) à la ville de plus de 50.000 habitants la plus proche. Même si ces données datent de l'an 2000, elles sont toujours un bon indice de l'éloignement d'un village. Elle sert à mesurer la disponibilité ou l'absence de services necessaires à la capacité d'adaptation.

label: # schools per 10,000 people
description: To add

label: Gini Index
description: To add

label: Administrative areas - level 3
description: To add

label: % poor cooking fuel
description: To add

label: % strong wall type
description: Percentage of buildings with concrete, cement, tile or metal sheet roofs.
description_french: Taux de bâtiments aux toits au béton, ciment, à la tôle ou aux tuiles.

label: % strong roof type
description: Percentage of buildings with brick, block, stone, or cement walls.
description_french: Taux de bâtiment aux murs en briques, bloc, pierre ou ciment.

label: % children U5
description: Percentage of the population younger than 5 years old. The younger the child, the more vulnerable it is.
description_french: Proportion de la population des enfants qui ont moins de 5 ans. Ce sont les enfants les plus vulnérables.

label: Poverty Index
description: The Multidimensional Poverty MPI Index identifies overlapping deprivations at the household level across the same three dimensions as the Human Development Index (living standards, health, and education) and shows the average number of poor people and deprivations with which poor households contend. Accessed through: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Greater-Horn-of-Africa

label: Food Incecurity Percentage
description: Percentage of food insecurity (sum of moderate and severe)

label: % children U5
description: Percentage of population under 5 years old. The younger the child, the more vulnerable it is.

label: % people over 65
description: Percentage of population over 65 years old. The older the person, the more vulnerable it is.

label: Malaria prevalence
description: Percentage of patients observed with malaria.

label: Access to electricity
description: The percentage of population with access to electricity. Electrification data are collected from industry, national surveys and international sources. Accessed through:  http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Greater-Horn-of-Africa

label: # education facilities per 10,000 people
description: The number of schools divided by the population.

label: # health facilities per 10,000 people
description: The percentage of total structure of health care.

label: Access to improved water source
description:
The indicator defines the percentage of population with reasonable access (within one km) to an adequate amount of water (20 litres per person) through a household connection, public standpipe well or spring, or rain water system.
An improved drinking-water source is defined as one that, by nature of its construction or through active intervention, is protected from outside contamination, in particular from contamination with faecal matter. Accessed through:  http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Greater-Horn-of-Africa

label: Access to improved sanitation facilities
description: Access to improved sanitation facilities refers to the percentage of the population using improved sanitation facilities. The improved sanitation facilities include flush/pour flush (to piped sewer system, septic tank, pit latrine), ventilated improved pit (VIP) latrine, pit latrine with slab, and composting toilet. Accessed through:  http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Greater-Horn-of-Africa

label: % people in need
description: Percentage of people in need of assistance.

label: % agricultural population
description: Percentage of people dependent on agriculture.

label: % agricultural fields
description: Percentage of fields.

label: Elevation
description:
Mean elevation in meters per commune.
 
For more information about elevation data see: Jarvis A., H.I. Reuter, A.  Nelson, E. Guevara, 2008, Hole-filled  seamless SRTM data V4, International  Centre for Tropical  Agriculture (CIAT), available  from http://srtm.csi.cgiar.org.

label: % agricultural fields
description: Percentage of fields.

label: Elevation
description:
Mean elevation in meters per commune.
 
For more information about elevation data see: Jarvis A., H.I. Reuter, A.  Nelson, E. Guevara, 2008, Hole-filled  seamless SRTM data V4, International  Centre for Tropical  Agriculture (CIAT), available  from http://srtm.csi.cgiar.org.
